text: @realDonaldTrump You are going to blame your loss on everyone but yourself ! I am sure you are freakin out right now bc not a lot of people showed up to your rally ! You didn’t protect us from Covid19 and now you are surprised people don’t want you anymore ?! Families lost their loved ones !!!
